name: 消失的纪元 The Lost Era
name_original: 消失的纪元 The Lost Era
description:
Through the character movement, defeat the boss to obtain the world key, solves the world the riddle. For example: in the realm of demons you will get the legendary eternal key, open the eternal land, to achieve immortality, in the land of the hand you will be shaking the power of heaven and earth, suggested that the game clearance time of 1.5 hours.
The story revolves around the nature of life, an ancient book reveals a strange event, our existence is really unique? Is the world really what we think it is? Would we be desperate to know the truth? Follow the ancient texts to the essence of the world

IS the work worth the price?

The game is one and a half hours long,excellent picture quality, very cheap, value for money

What if we don’t like the game?

Customer Service agrees to a refund request, and if the customer servic does not agree,You can contact me.

The lonely swordman Works
